title: NETWORK_GET_ENTITY_OWNER
content:
0x526FEE31// NetworkGetEntityOwner
int NETWORK_GET_ENTITY_OWNER(Entity entity);Parameters:entity: The entity to get the owner for.Returns: On the server, the server ID of the entity owner. On the client, returns the player/slot ID of the entity owner.Returns the owner ID of the specified entity.
codeBlocks:
local entity = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for NETWORK_GET_ENTITY_OWNER
NetworkGetEntityOwner(entity)
